name: secularist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who believes that religion should not be involved with the ordinary social and political activities of a country: Secularists condemn Christian influence in the public sphere.
More examplesFewer examplesSecularists worry that with the AKP running the government, religious conservatism will grow.the nation's culture wars, pitting evangelical Christians against secularistsThe European participants were mainly secularists and had little understanding of Islam. Secularists aren't atheists. They just believe in the separation of church and state.
